roleset.name: close one eye
roleset.note: WINK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wink' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.3.1, Framenet entry Body movement. (from wink.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no eye
example.text: ``Frankly, as I was walking back to get in my car, I heard many, many people ... opening champagne bottles and celebrating individual victories that [some of us]-3 had accomplished in [*-3]getting our little deal in the tax bill and winking at this person for slipping this in,'' he said.

example.name: with eye
example.text: John slowly winked his left eye.
